Sentencas: Ceria based solid solutions are promising ceramic electrolytes for SOFC which will be able to function at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In accordance with common trends to decrease the production and operating costs of new generation of SOFC materials the reaction based on metathetical pathway is described, whereby solid solution powders of rare earth doped ceria in the nanoscale range were obtained at room temperature.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: By simple hand mixing of reactants the reaction was enhanced, propagating afterwards by itself.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Nanometric ceria powders doped with Y or Nd, as well as co doped with both cations were synthesized.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Composition of Ce1-xMexO2-y ranged from x =0-0.25.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The reaction course is described in detail and the properties of the obtained powders are presented.
Titulo: Self-propagating room temperature synthesis of nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC)
